title: Protecting Controlled Unclassified Information in Nonfederal Systems and Organizations

3.4.1.title: System Component Inventory
3.4.1.description: Establish and maintain baseline configurations and inventories of organizational systems.

implementation.notes: CUI-marked system inventory with MAC addresses, serial numbers, software versions

3.4.2.title: Security Configuration Enforcement
3.4.2.description: Establish and enforce security configuration settings for information technology products.

implementation.notes: Verifies and enforces security configurations on host systems

3.5.10.title: Cryptographic Authentication
3.5.10.description: Store and transmit only cryptographically-protected passwords.

implementation.notes: Detects plaintext passwords and credentials in source code

3.8.9.title: Media Sanitization
3.8.9.description: Sanitize or destroy system media containing CUI before disposal or release for reuse.

implementation.notes: NIST SP 800-88 Clear method with verification

3.11.2.title: Vulnerability Scanning
3.11.2.description: Scan for vulnerabilities in organizational systems and applications periodically and when new vulnerabilities are identified.

implementation.notes: Comprehensive vulnerability scanning with NVD and CISA KEV integration

3.11.3.title: Vulnerability Remediation
3.11.3.description: Remediate vulnerabilities in accordance with risk assessments.

implementation.notes: CVSS scoring enables risk-based remediation prioritization

3.13.16.title: CUI at Rest
3.13.16.description: Protect the confidentiality of CUI at rest.

implementation.notes: CUI inventory files created with mode 600 (owner read/write only)

3.14.1.title: Flaw Remediation
3.14.1.description: Identify, report, and correct system flaws in a timely manner.

implementation.notes: Automated vulnerability identification with CVE details

3.14.2.title: Malicious Code Protection
3.14.2.description: Provide protection from malicious code at designated locations within organizational systems.

implementation.notes: ClamAV malware scanning with automatic signature updates

3.14.3.title: Security Alerts and Advisories
3.14.3.description: Monitor system security alerts and advisories and take action in response.

implementation.notes: CISA KEV catalog integration for known exploited vulnerabilities

3.14.6.title: System Monitoring
3.14.6.description: Monitor organizational systems, including inbound and outbound communications traffic.

implementation.notes: Network port monitoring and system security auditing
